attributes.action: Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
attributes.additional_details:
Animals are put through weeks and weeks of unnecessary torture because of the general public setting fireworks off around bonfire night, new years eve etc.

Please change the law to ensure that fireworks are only sold to organisers and not the general public to reduce the suffering that pets experience when fireworks are set off.
attributes.background: Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public and only sell them to organised events.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557780
